name: Escape the Temple
description: You have discovered an ancient temple in the middle of the jungle, upon entering the ceiling caves in and traps you in. You must search the temple for the way out, and you must find a key to unlock doors that are blocking your way. You must be careful though as you progress because the temple is collapsing, you must avoid falling rocks and traps, and be careful to not step on the crumbling floor or you might fall through.
